name: NoAlertLoop
author: Jake0oo0
description: Prevent malicious websites from creating an infinite amount of popups.

1.0.1: Made patch similar to iOS 9 fix
Popup asking whether or not to mute a website's popups

screenshots.noalertloop1.jpg: Safari popup allowing the user to choose whether or not to mute a website
screenshots.noalertloop2.jpg: Popup in a 3rd party app (AlienBlue) doing the same thing
